question: Which one of the following first mooted the idea of a constituent assembly to frame a constitution for India?
explanation: The Swaraj Party was established as the Congress-Khilafat Swaraj Party. It was a political party formed in India in January 1923 after the Gaya annual conference in December 1922 of the National Congress that sought greater self-government and political freedom for the Indian people from the British Raj.
